Package production.intermittent.PetrolGenerator

Interface PetrolGeneratorExternalControlI

All Known Subinterfaces:
PetrolGeneratorExternalControlCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
PetrolGenerator, PetrolGeneratorExternalControlConnector, PetrolGeneratorExternalControlInboundPort, PetrolGeneratorExternalControlOutboundPort
public interface PetrolGeneratorExternalControlI
The interface PetrolGeneratorUserAndExternalControlI declares the signatures of service implementations accessible to the external controller.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      getCurrentPowerLevel() <= getMaxPowerLevel()

Created on : 2023-10-15

Author:
Daniel SIMA
